New-SystemTestTemplate

New-SystemTestTemplate

external help file: checkit-core-help.xml Module Name: checkit-core online version: schema: 2.0.0 ‚Äî

New-SystemTestTemplate

SYNOPSIS

Quick helper to create common system test templates.

SYNTAX

New-SystemTestTemplate [[-Type] ] [-Save]

DESCRIPTION

Pre-built templates for common testing scenarios.

EXAMPLES

EXAMPLE 1

New-SystemTestTemplate -Type Basic -Save

PARAMETERS

-Type

Type of test: Basic, Extended, Software, Hardware.

```yaml Type: String Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases:

Required: False Position: 1 Default value: Basic Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False

-Save

```yaml Type: SwitchParameter Parameter Sets: (All) Aliases:

Required: False Position: Named Default value: False Accept pipeline input: False Accept wildcard characters: False

INPUTS

OUTPUTS
